name: Surgut Going Home
description:
Game Canon:
 This game is about a creature, one of Surgut. Surguts are intelligent beings who live on one planet in another galaxy 
 (3 billion light years away from the Sun). They used to live in small communities, and over time, their unified state appeared. 
 They never had wars, so other races living in the same galaxy (which Surgut did not know about) dubbed this planet a special status, 
 placed guard ships at the entrance to the star system of Surgut and protected this system from external wars and other influences. 
 Surgut distinguishes only shades of gray, and from that they see the world in black and white. But unlike vision,
 their hearing is very developed and has a very large range. 

Here, one Surgut went to study his native island. After a tedious journey, 
 he is supposed to return to his home. But he also has one unfinished case - 
 local scientists have invented a device that can expand the range of visible colors. 
 Our Surgut could not ignore this in any way. The game begins.
